name: Pokerrrr 2-Poker with Buddies
description:
Pokerrrr 2 is the ultimate multiplayer poker app to play with your buddies! It’s as simple as creating a free private room, setting the rules, and dealing out the cards. It’s like having poker night in the palm of your hand, anytime, anywhere!

Let Pokerrrr 2 be the shuffler and dealer so you can get right into playing game modes like No Limit Hold’em, Sit-and-go, Pot-Limit Omaha, Round of Each, and more! With the custom game feature, you can set all the details of the table, like the blinds, buy-in range, and max players. Hook up to the big screen and play with friends directly on your TV!

Want to meet new poker buddies? Join or create a Poker club and play with people from around the world!

What are you waiting for? Download the app now and join your friends to play just like a pro!

Pokerrrr 2 Features:
Pokerrrr 2 is a virtual poker app to play poker with friends. Getting started is simple, just install the app, create a private room, and share the room code! You’ll also be able to keep records of your past games.

Pokerrrr Tables
- Host games live or online in private rooms, just for friends!
- Multiple game modes, including NL Hold’em, SNG, MTT, PLO, and R.O.E., for up to 9 players.
- Auto shuffler and dealer, so you can spend more time playing!
- Our unique Hand history allows you to replay any intense hand whenever you want.

Pokerrrr Clubs
- Create free private clubs with your friends from around the world, or join other clubs to meet new players.
- Each club has a members-only chat and place for hosted games.
- Invite friends to a club with the unique club code

Pokerrrr On the Big Screen TV
Having a poker party? Use your iPad to connect to your TV and play on the big screen! Host with your phone and join with your iPad! Community cards will be shown on iPad while two hand cards are dealt to each player's phone. Big Screen mode support cash game, SNG and MTT.

Download now to get started playing the most amazing multiplayer Poker experience on the App Store! Invite friends and play like the stars. It’s as simple as host, share, and play!
